Name: Adagio
About the game: A short VR experience, Adagio places the viewer in a dreamy, Celtic landscape in the brief moment of darkness right before dawn. Are they alone or accompanied? Some say that as dawn breaks, you can witness ghosts tasting the morning dew. Polishing a specific moment and feeling to a mirror finish, Adagio is the perfect VR experience to take a brief break from your daily routine and peek into a world not quite like ours.
Meta Title: Adagio: May 23, 2019, Imaginary Spaces and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Adagio? Check out the release date (May 23, 2019), developer insights from Imaginary Spaces, and a complete game summary.
